name: blamegpt
description: GitHub Action to run BlameGPT on issues.

scripts.tag: git tag -f v1 && git tag v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") || true && git push origin -f v1 && git push origin v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && npm run tag

author: Rushat Gabhane
